filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description: SimpleBank.claim(address,uint256) (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#43-53) ignores return value by token.transfer(account,amount) (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#49)

Contract locking ether found:
	Contract SimpleBank (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#22-65) has payable functions:
	 - SimpleBank.receive() (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#64)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in SimpleBank.claim(address,uint256) (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#43-53):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(account,amount) (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#49)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mints[account] += amount (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#50)
	SimpleBank._mints (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#25) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- SimpleBank._mints (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#25)
	- SimpleBank.claim(address,uint256) (samples/ds/tier4/contracts/ds_t4_001.sol#43-53)

Reentrancy in ERC777._send(address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes,bool) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#348-366):
	External calls:
	- _callTokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#361)
		- IERC777Sender(implementer).tokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#449)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _move(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#363)
		- _balances[from] = fromBalance - amount (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#409)
		- _balances[to] += amount (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#411)

Reentrancy in ERC777._burn(address,uint256,bytes,bytes) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#375-394):
	External calls:
	- _callTokensToSend(operator,from,address(0),amount,data,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#380)
		- IERC777Sender(implementer).tokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#449)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _balances[from] = fromBalance - amount (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#388)
	- _totalSupply -= amount (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#390)

Reentrancy in ERC777._burn(address,uint256,bytes,bytes) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#375-394):
	External calls:
	- _callTokensToSend(operator,from,address(0),amount,data,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#380)
		- IERC777Sender(implementer).tokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#449)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Burned(operator,from,amount,data,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#392)
	- Transfer(from,address(0),amount) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#393)

Reentrancy in ERC777._mint(address,uint256,bytes,bytes,bool) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#316-337):
	External calls:
	- _callTokensReceived(operator,address(0),account,amount,userData,operatorData,requireReceptionAck) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#333)
		- IERC777Recipient(implementer).tokensReceived(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#475)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Minted(operator,account,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#335)
	- Transfer(address(0),account,amount) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#336)

Reentrancy in ERC777._send(address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes,bool) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#348-366):
	External calls:
	- _callTokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#361)
		- IERC777Sender(implementer).tokensToSend(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#449)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Sent(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#413)
		- _move(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#363)
	- Transfer(from,to,amount) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#414)
		- _move(operator,from,to,amount,userData,operatorData) (traditionaltools/slither/node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC777/ERC777.sol#363)
